text: @SenMcSallyAZ @POTUS @VP You're an idiot. They are not even testing for covid19. If hhs cannot tell you today how many DEAD people have been for tested covid19 then they are not testing anyone. They cannot even tell you of the thousands that died of viral pneumonia today how many were tested for covid19.
